summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of route allocation bug fix. All 46 tests passed including new specialized tests for route allocation optimization. Verified that ALL vehicles get route assignments, proper handling of edge cases, and complete Retell payload integration.
passed_tests: Individual ward and vehicle CRUD operations
ML optimization run and route generation
Route allocation bug fix verification (5 vehicles, 3 wards)
Equal scenario route allocation (3 vehicles, 3 wards)
All vehicles receive route assignments (not just one with multiple trips)
Extra vehicles get route docs with 0 wards when vehicles > wards
Each ward uniquely assigned to exactly one vehicle
Retell payloads include all drivers created by optimization
